products.title: Metz Pvc Blackout Snow White 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: The metz pvc blackout patterned range, changes colour shades when light hits it, and offers a wide array of colours to choose from. Waterproof and flame retardant, metz fabrics are durable and practical. Vertical blinds offer optimal light and privacy control, so are a firm favourite in the uk, especially with overlooked houses and office. This bright white, marbled, snow white blackout vertical blind is also great at blocking out light, so is a great option for rooms where screens feature, such as living rooms or offices, and due to it's waterproof fabric, is also a smart option for bathrooms or kitchensat swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new vertical blind is made by their expert team, in their yorkshire workshop, and comes with a free five year guarantee and customer-first aftercare.

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Serenity Grey Roller Blind
products.description: This stylish japanese inspired design features a soft wash of grey with hints of white and touches of pink to give it the perfect balance of pastel colour. Little blossom sits on delicate branches giving this an air of peace and tranquillity. Ideal to dress up a light and airy room, gorgeous cherry blossom blackout serenity grey roller blind is made from a luxurious blackout faux silk and treated with pollergen a unique fabric treatment that neutralises pollen so helping to relieve hayfever symptoms.

products.title: Versailles Blackout Mushroom Roller Blind
products.description: Bring luxury to any family space with the practical versailles mushroom blackout roller blind. This print inspired by chic french interiors features an ornate pattern picked out in grey and exceptionally printed on convenient wipe-clean, blackout fabric. The subtle, two-tone design gives this intricate motif a simplicity that can be used to great effect. Layer with varying shades of grey to add depth and drama to a room.

products.title: Magnolia Blackout Inky Roller Blind
products.description: Magnolia blackout is a beautiful floral patterned fabric available in two lovely colours. This bold white and grey roller blind is perfect to add a floral touch to any room in your home. The neutral colours in the pattern also mean this blind will go with a lot of decors. Product id: db-rbx1880 fabric colour: inky material: 80% polyester 20% cotton lining: white backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes magnolia blackout inky roller blind in grey/multicoloured.

products.title: Versailles Blackout Ivory Roller Blind
products.description: Versailles blackout ivory is a charming, classical electric blind with metallic textured pattern that gives it a premium finish. In the softest ivory, it gives rooms an airy feel and adds some real luxury to a window. Crafted with blackout material, it wont allow light to enter into your room when closed and the electrical operation makes it easy to operate. The blind is also treated with pollergen, this neutralises pollen so it doesnt disturb hayfever sufferers.

products.title: Maine Ll Blackout Angora Roller Blind
products.description: The maine ll blackout range is available in a choice of 3 beautiful colours. A perfect addition to any room for a very affordable price. This brown roller blind will create a cosy feel and is perfect for rooms where keeping light out is key such as your bedroom or living room.
